bibl.title: The Significance of the Papyri for Determining the Nature of the New Testament Text in the Second Century: A Dynamic View of Textual Transmission.
bibl.note: Reproduit de: William L. PETERSEN (Ed.), Gospel Traditions in the Second Century: Origins, Recensions, Text, and Transmission = Christianity and Judaism in Antiquity. 3 (Notre-Dame, Indiana, 1989) pp. 1-32, 1 carte. - Pp. 380-381: Added Notes, 2004.

bibl.title: Eldon Jay EPP, Perspectives on New Testament Textual Criticism. Collected Essays, 1962-2004 = Supplements to Novum Testamentum. 116
